He said, "I guess your whole budget goes on nachos and hot dogs, right? So you can't afford two seats? Next time pass the hat, I'm sure all your fellow passengers will be very generous!"
The woman turned her face to the window, and in the reflection, James could see the tears running down her cheeks.

MY SISTER BILLED ME $2,145 FOR THE SURPRISE BIRTHDAY PARTY SHE THREW FOR ME – I WAS READY TO PAY UNTIL KARMA EXPOSED HER TRUE REASON
I told my sister I wasn’t planning anything for my birthday this year because I needed to save money to pay off my medical bill. She seemed to understand. As my birthday approached, she invited me over for coffee. When I walked in, everyone I knew jumped out screaming, "Surprise!" The evening was amazing, and I was grateful for her effort.
Grateful, right until my sister handed me an envelope. A birthday card? No. A $2,145 bill FOR THE PARTY I DIDN’T ASK FOR.
“You can take your time paying it off! I know money’s tight,” she smiled. I was speechless, stunned by her audacity. But to avoid a fight at the party, I bit my tongue.
My mind was panicking trying to decide what I should do, but karma was faster. As my sister went to grab a cake from the delivery guy, she dropped her wallet and everyone saw how 👇👇
